title: Ufetubus
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   | A chattering and shrieking minor demon.***“We were permitted to shriek in the tongue of dwarfs and demons” -Czesław Miłosz, “A Task”. |

## Useful Info

**Ufetubi** are fast, puny tier-[5](/5 "5") demons which hound you, sneaking behind you and dealing minor damage. They can be found in the early Dungeon, [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss"), or when summoned by other monsters. [Ynoxinuls](/Ynoxinul "Ynoxinul") in particular summon hordes of them.

## Tips & Tricks

Even in large numbers, ufetubi are hardly a threat. When summoned in droves, they will usually outpace other threats and surround you, bogging you down. Don't waste time killing summoned ufetubi while actual threats are around, unless they're blocking your way to a [smiter](/Smite "Smite").

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), ufetubi will get a damage buff: 5 -> 6 (for both attacks). Also, they will appear earlier in the Dungeon: on D:4-7 instead of D:5-7.
- In [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), ufetubi got the **AF\_FLANK** attack flavour and slightly more HP; their size was reduced from medium to small. Also, they spawn in pairs and appear on D:5-7 instead of D:4-7 now.
- In [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), they replaced [crimson imps](/Crimson_imp "Crimson imp") in [the Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon").

Ufetubus

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
ufetubus 5 
HP 5-12
HD 1
XP 8
Speed 15
AC 2
EV 15
Will 10
Attack1 5 (hit: flank)
Attack2 5 (hit: plain)


Resistances rC+
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Fire
Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Demonic
Size Small
Type ufetubus, ufetubus
Flags
A chattering and shrieking minor demon.

“We were permitted to shriek in the tongue of dwarfs and demons”
-Czesław Miłosz, “A Task”.

Useful Info

Ufetubi are fast, puny tier-5 demons which hound you, sneaking behind you and dealing minor damage. They can be found in the early Dungeon, the Abyss, or when summoned by other monsters. Ynoxinuls in particular summon hordes of them.

Tips & Tricks

Even in large numbers, ufetubi are hardly a threat. When summoned in droves, they will usually outpace other threats and surround you, bogging you down. Don't waste time killing summoned ufetubi while actual threats are around, unless they're blocking your way to a smiter.

History

  • In 0.32, ufetubi will get a damage buff: 5 -> 6 (for both attacks). Also, they will appear earlier in the Dungeon: on D:4-7 instead of D:5-7.
  • In 0.31, ufetubi got the AF_FLANK attack flavour and slightly more HP; their size was reduced from medium to small. Also, they spawn in pairs and appear on D:5-7 instead of D:4-7 now.
  • In 0.26, they replaced crimson imps in the Dungeon.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Ufetubus&oldid=80260"

{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Ufetubi''' are fast, puny tier-[[5]] demons which hound you, sneaking behind you and dealing minor damage. They can be found in the early Dungeon, [[the Abyss]], or when summoned by other monsters. [[Ynoxinul]]s in particular summon hordes of them.

==Tips & Tricks==
Even in large numbers, ufetubi are hardly a threat. When summoned in droves, they will usually outpace other threats and surround you, bogging you down. Don't waste time killing summoned ufetubi while actual threats are around, unless they're blocking your way to a [[smite]]r.

==History==
{{CBA|0.32|ufetubi will get a damage buff: 5 -> 6 (for both attacks). Also, they will appear earlier in the Dungeon: on D:4-7 instead of D:5-7.}}
*In [[0.31]], ufetubi got the '''AF_FLANK''' attack flavour and slightly more HP; their size was reduced from medium to small. Also, they spawn in pairs and appear on D:5-7 instead of D:4-7 now.
*In [[0.26]], they replaced [[crimson imp]]s in [[the Dungeon]].
